item.title: 预算案公布后，英国房屋建造量创五个月来最大降幅
item.description: 上个月，S&P Global 的总体建筑业采购经理人指数（PMI）从 10 月份的 54.3 上升到 55.2，远高于经济学家预期的 53.5。任何高于 50 的指数都预示着增长。然而，商业工程和土木工程的强劲增长被房屋建筑商的部分增长所抵消，房屋建筑商在上个月出现萎缩。【原文：UK housebuilding declined at the sharpest pace in five months in November with construction firms blaming weak consumer confidence after the Labour government's first budget.S&P Global's overall construction PMI rose to a score of 55.2 last month, up from 54.3 in October and much better than the drop to 53.5 expected by economists. Any score above 50 signals growth. However, strong growth in commercial work and civil engineering was partially offset by housebuilders, which contracted for the】

item.title: 医药出口促使丹麦上调 2025 年增长预测
item.description: 丹麦政府预测，受诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）等制药商出口的推动，丹麦经济明年的增长速度将超过此前的预期。【原文：The Danish economy will expand faster next year than previously estimated, boosted by exports from drugmakers including Novo Nordisk A/S, the government forecast.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"开会讨论进一步推迟恢复石油产量的问题
item.description: 欧佩克+将于周四举行在线会议，讨论进一步推迟恢复石油生产的计划。【原文：OPEC+ will meet online on Thursday to discuss further delay to its plans to revive oil production.】

item.title: 沃达丰 150 亿英镑交易为欧洲整合打开大门
item.description: 沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）创建英国最大移动电话公司的交易获得批准，这是欧洲电信运营商的一个重要里程碑，为可能出现的行业整合浪潮打开了大门，使该行业得以重建。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc won approval for a deal to create the UK’s biggest mobile phone company in a major milestone for European telecommunications operators, opening the door for a potential wave of consolidation that would allow the industry to rebuild.】

item.title: 立法者称印尼将继续提高部分商品的增值税
item.description: 据一位立法者称，印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）计划在一月份提高部分商品的增值税率。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto plans to go ahead with raising the value-added tax rate on some goods in January, according to a lawmaker.】

item.title: 出口下降，南非经常账户缺口超出预期
item.description: 由于商品出口额的降幅大于商品进口额的降幅，南非第三季度经常账户赤字的收窄幅度超出预期。【原文：South Africa’s current-account deficit narrowed more than expected in the third quarter as the value of goods exports decreased more than merchandise imports.】

item.title: 努里埃尔-鲁比尼关于新避风港 ETF 的愿景
item.description: 多年来，投资者一直依赖经典的 60/40 股票和债券投资组合。这背后的理念很简单：当股票下跌时，债券往往会上涨，因此这两样东西应该起到天然的对冲作用。但是，当通货膨胀在 2022 年和 2023 年飙升时，60/40 投资组合表现糟糕，债券未能起到安全缓冲的作用。在本期节目中，我们将采访新成立的阿特拉斯美国基金（Atlas America Fund）的首席经济学家兼投资组合经理努里埃尔-鲁比尼（Nouriel Roubini）。【原文：For years, investors have relied on the classic 60/40 portfolio of stocks and bonds. The idea behind this was simple: bonds tend to go up when stocks go down, so the two things should act as a natural hedge. But when inflation spiked in 2022 and 2023, the 60/40 portfolio performed terribly and bonds failed to act as a safety cushion. In this episode, we speak with Nouriel Roubini, chief economist and portfolio manager of the new Atlas America Fund, an ETF that is trying to create a new type of s】

item.title: 富时指数有望升级，越南股市创八月以来最大涨幅
item.description: 越南股市创下自 8 月中旬以来的最大涨幅，分析师称富时罗素与越南市场监管机构之间的会晤提振了对 2025 年指数升级可能性的乐观情绪。【原文：Vietnamese shares rose the most since mid-August, with analysts citing a meeting between FTSE Russell and the country’s market regulator as boosting optimism over a potential index upgrade in 2025.】

item.title: 瑞士钟表股价因需求改善迹象而上涨
item.description: 瑞士手表集团公司（Watches of Switzerland Group Plc）上涨，原因是这家英国劳力士手表销量最大的公司第二财季销售额回升，并重申了全年财务指导。【原文：Watches of Switzerland Group Plc rose after the top seller of Rolex watches in Britain saw a pickup in sales in its fiscal second quarter and reaffirmed its full-year financial guidance.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会撤销对高谭公司有关 Grifols 账户报告的调查
item.description: 美国放弃了对 Gotham City Research 母公司 General Industrial Partners LLP 的调查，该公司在今年早些时候指控药品制造商 Grifols SA 存在欺骗性会计行为。【原文：The US dropped its investigation into General Industrial Partners LLP, the parent company of Gotham City Research, which accused drug maker Grifols SA of deceptive accounting earlier this year.】

item.title: 价差暴跌后韩国计划提高隔夜韩元流动性
item.description: 在本周的政治危机引发韩元汇率剧烈波动之后，韩国正计划采取措施提高盘后韩元的流动性。【原文：South Korea is planning measures to boost after-hours liquidity in the won, after this week’s political crisis triggered a surge in volatility in the currency.】

item.title: 欧盟新任反垄断局长称谷歌分拆仍在 "讨论之中
item.description: 欧盟新任竞争主管特雷莎-里贝拉（Teresa Ribera）表示，谷歌业务的潜在分拆仍在考虑之中，她还承诺将与即将上任的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）建立联系。【原文：A potential split of Google’s business is still under consideration, according to Teresa Ribera, the European Union’s new competition chief, who also pledged to build bridges with incoming US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 鸿海月销售额增长乏力，人工智能需求放缓

item.title: 外国资金因印度央行鸽派押注而重回印度债券市场
item.description: 海外投资者正重返印度有资格被纳入全球指数的主权债券，因为押注印度央行将增加流动性，当地债务也随之上涨。【原文：Overseas investors are returning to India’s sovereign bonds eligible for global index inclusion as local debt gains on bets the central bank will boost liquidity.】

item.title: 阿联酋港口运营商 DP World 计划扩建印度港口以缓解延迟问题
item.description: 总部位于阿拉伯联合酋长国的港口运营商 DP World Ltd. 首席执行官表示，该公司计划在印度扩张，以缓解贸易瓶颈。【原文：DP World Ltd., a United Arab Emirates-based port operator, plans to expand in India to alleviate trade bottlenecks, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 据称香港置地考虑出售新加坡开发商 MCL
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亚洲房地产集团香港置地控股有限公司（Hongkong Land Holdings Ltd.）正在考虑出售其控股的房地产开发商 MCL Land Ltd.。【原文：Asian real estate group Hongkong Land Holdings Ltd. is considering selling its closely held property developer arm MCL Land Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 壳牌与 Equinor 将合并英国北海资产成立新公司
item.description: Equinor ASA 公司和壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）将合并其在英国的海上石油和天然气资产，成立一家新公司，该公司将成为英国北海最大的独立生产商。【原文：Equinor ASA and Shell Plc are to combine their UK offshore oil and gas assets to form a new company, which will be the UK North Sea’s biggest independent producer.】

item.title: 瑞典核心通胀率升至六个月来最高点
item.description: 在瑞典央行决定加快降息步伐以支持萎靡不振的经济之后，瑞典 11 月份的核心通胀率升至六个月来的最高水平。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation rate rose in November to its highest level in six months after the Riksbank decided to increase the pace of interest-rate cuts to support the ailing economy.】

item.title: 德国 10 月份工厂订单降幅低于预期
item.description: 德国 10 月份的工厂订单降幅低于预期，这使得该国多年的制造业衰退有望触底反弹。【原文：German factory orders dropped less than expected in October, raising the prospect that the country’s multi-year manufacturing recession is bottoming out.】

item.title: Blackstone 寻求为 AirTrunk 提供 26 亿美元多币种贷款
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正与一组银行洽谈，以牵头为澳大利亚数据中心运营商 AirTrunk Pte.【原文：Blackstone Inc. is in talks with a group of banks to lead an around A$4 billion ($2.6 billion) multi-currency loan for Australian data center operator AirTrunk Pte., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description: 根据彭博社调查的最新估计，随着唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，关税可能进一步放缓中国经济，明年香港和新加坡的经济增长可能面临压力。【原文：Growth in Hong Kong and Singapore for next year may come under pressure as Donald Trump returns to the White House armed with tariffs that may further slow China’s economy, according to the latest estimates from a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 莫迪领导的政党夺回印度金融中心的首席部长职位
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的印度人民党（Bharatiya Janata Party）将任命一名高级领导人领导马哈拉施特拉邦政府，夺回对印度金融中心孟买所在邦的控制权。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Bharatiya Janata Party will appoint one of its senior leaders to head the government in Maharashtra, reclaiming control of the state that houses India’s financial hub of Mumbai.】

item.title: 南非航空公司飞行员周四开始罢工讨薪
item.description: 在与南非国有航空公司就加薪问题谈判失败后，南非国有航空公司的飞行员将于周四开始罢工。【原文：Pilots working for South Africa’s state-owned national carrier will start a strike Thursday after talks with the airline over a pay increase failed.】

item.title: 特朗普能否让美国例外论长盛不衰？
item.description:
在过去的 15 年里，美国股票一直主导着所有其他股票。但风险是众所周知的，越来越多的人认为必须继续下去，这让人感到不安。【原文：

US stocks have dominated all others for the past 15 years. But the risks are known, and growing consensus that it must continue is uncomfortable.

】

item.title: S.韩国反对党领袖李在镕支持重返卖空市场
item.description: 韩国反对党领袖李在明（Lee Jae-myung）是在短暂的戒严令之后接替现任韩国总统的主要竞争者之一，他赞成恢复股票卖空。【原文：South Korea’s opposition leader Lee Jae-myung, who’s among the leading contenders to replace the sitting South Korean president after a brief martial law decree, is in favor of bringing back short selling in stocks.】

item.title: 韩国迅速应对危机限制了动荡对市场的影响
item.description: 韩国本周短暂的戒严令令市场恐慌，但官员们迅速采取行动恢复民主规范并安抚投资者，从而限制了损失--至少目前如此。【原文：South Korea’s brief lurch to martial law this week spooked markets, but rapid action by officials to restore democratic norms and reassure investors has limited the damage – at least for now.】

item.title: 震惊世界的飙升推动韩国锌达到 "无法解释 "的水平
item.description: 在韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.）下个月愈演愈烈的代理权争夺战之前，渴望获利的投资者正将这家锌冶炼厂的股票推向全球股票指数的首位。【原文：Investors keen on profiting ahead of Korea Zinc Co.’s intensifying proxy battle next month are pushing the zinc smelter’s stock to the top of a global equity index.】
